website_summaries.verdict: Adorable design and affordable price make this quad almost irresistible.
pros: Pretty colors and Frozen theme so little people can ride in style
Contoured seat adds a bit of comfort
Low body and footsteps make getting on and off that much easier
cons: White wheels will likely get dirty quickly
Best for harder surfaces and may not work well on grass

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter who was 20 months old at the time and it is the perfect size. She's not too interested in it at times but does like to ride it. There is room for her to grow on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernGrl40

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 2 year old on her birthday. She adores it. I was suprised how quickly she was able to navigate just how to use it. It looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Reesh O'B

customer_reviews.title: Came on time
customer_reviews.text: Out daughter loves it so far even though she needs more practice. Make sure to get a helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Arce Zombies

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little pain to put together, some other brands comes preassemble. But it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine J.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves this. She does have a hard time making turns.
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a little Princess
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves this toy! My sister lives far away, so I always buy my niece gifts on Amazon without actually getting to see them. But they sent me pictures of her riding all around the house with it. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purple one has a manufacturers defect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a purple one and it came with no male and female ends for the tires and rims as shown in the instructions. So i returned and ordered a new one came and it the same way. Don't waste your time with the purple one.
customer_reviews.author: james eichbrecht jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our three year old granddaughter. She totally loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Country

customer_reviews.title: Happy Granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this quad! Very happy with product and delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Claire W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter got this for her 2yr bday she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Safe quad for little girls.
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loves it. She is one and a half and she knows how to use it. It sits low and she seems safe riding it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Arce

customer_reviews.title: It is very durable and a great gift for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my granddaughter and she absolutely loves. Of course her and her brother are fighting over it. It is very durable and a great gift for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Barely Moves
customer_reviews.text: This Ride On barely moves. It does not work outside unless you are on pavement. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 of my washers were missing and none were different sizes like the directions show
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive all of the hardware required to install the wheels. 2 of my washers were missing and none were different sizes like the directions show. Have some extra washers or screws laying around if you buy this
customer_reviews.author: ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item -- my almost 2 year old granddaughter loves it. Seller was awesome
customer_reviews.author: Michele Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand daughter and she just got it yesterday but so far it is perfect. No problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lore A. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a birthday present and she loved it! Easy to put together and rise smooth!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product amazing price fast!!! Shipping could not be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: Burl J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this! My daughter pushes the button and the wants her baby dolls to ride it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We leave this ride on at my mother in laws for whenever we visit. We have not had to charge this thing for almost 6 months and our daughter uses this every time we visit. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! Perfect for my two year old Grandbaby!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with ride-on
customer_reviews.text: Happy with ride-on , but could do with a better battery as charge only lasts up to 30 minuted .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute, but that's the only positive thing I can say. It didn't even work 6 months! The battery will not charge. Very disappointing for my daughter's bday gift.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: battery life sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frozen toddler quad for my daughter just a month ago along with another disney cars toddler quad for my son... and you can see a big different in power btw the two!!! we live in the middle of the block and by the time they both get to the end of the block her car is already lagging behind. You can also see that the frozen car can barely go on grass like the disney cars. I wish they would make the power/battery life better
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for two year old
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this car for our nieces second birthday and it was a huge hit! She caught on quickly with how to use it and was giggling like crazy in her new ride!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: happy granddaughter rides
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my granddaughter can't keep it out in the open because when she sees it she's going to ride doesn't matter what the weather is now I'm getting her the car thanks for keeping the price lower than anybody else
customer_reviews.author: David  Pepperday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made and lots of fun for the little ones
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Hanna

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter finally enjoys riding it. It scared her when she first pushed on the go button so she would just put things on the seat and push it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria's grandma

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this item unless you're buying for a 1 year old. My 2 1/2 year old can't fit on it. She's too tall... The packaging says 18 months +. Everyone says this is going to be too small for my daughter. It just arrived at my job. Unfortunately, it can't be returned. I order from Amazon at least 10 times a month. As a customer & mother I'm so upset... I emailed to try to return this item but it might not be in my favor. So sad! My daughter loves Anna & Elsa. She asked me for this item. So sad to say she won't be able to enjoy her 3rd Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: MizzJonez17

customer_reviews.title: Great little wheeler.
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple years, has been a great little wheeler. My daughter loves it. If the battery goes dead, goto Walmart and buy the rechargeable deerfeeder batteries, there 6v and the run time is longer, gotta get creative on connecting it. I have 2 and one runs in her wheeler, the other is in my sons kidtrax monster fire truck. I'm talking 2-3hours run time on those batteries, the charger for them should be near the batteries in the hunting section. Its for 6-12v batteries.
customer_reviews.author: T.Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Needs some assembly
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves it! Although it did take my son-in-law longer than expected to put it together while the toddler anxiously waited...and he's a mechanic. Once together - lots of fun was had. Came charged and doesn't take long to charge when needed. If buying for a gift - may want to put it together beforehand (before the toddler sees it).
customer_reviews.author: SandiS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect quad for your princess
customer_reviews.text: Putting this quad together was fairly simple, the hardest part for me was trying to d it while my one year old tried to help me. But it seems to be made from good materials and won't break down anytime soon. The battery it in lasts for a while. We have had this for almost two months and my daughter rides it a few times a week and it still has not needed to me recharged. This is a great purchase for your little princess. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AloraTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service sucks as bad as the battery
customer_reviews.text: This product has terrible battery life and not only that its the adapter insert thats bad too. I spent hours looking for a replacement battery because the company won't replace them and when i finally found one i found that not only the battery went bad but the whole charging unit that connects to the battery. Better to buy a higher end product. Battery life alone was terrible on a charge/used base and not even a month later whole battery died...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift. Our daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great gift. Our daughter loves it. It is for a smaller kid though. Our 4 year old cannot fit his feet on it, but it is strong enough for him to ride. Our daughter would prefer a foot pedal for motion, but is pleased with the hand control. Charge lasted a long time. We don’t charge it regularly and it seems to hold it’s charge well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great black Friday purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, put together easily and quickly. Only complaint is that the power button is far enough away from the handle that it is a little hard for our little one to reach and steer as her thumb can't reach far enough to press the button while holding on to the handle. If your child is larger or if you are purchasing for a child older than 2 I would imagine that you wouldn't experience the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this second hand and not brand new at full price .. All of the bad reviews I'm reading are true. Doesn't work in grass, on an incline and the battery life is horrible. If I would have paid full price for this I'd be very upset. Bad enough I had to see disapointment on my daughter's face!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brune

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this little guy.
customer_reviews.text: got pulled over by the cops after leaving 7-11 with beers. oh man!
customer_reviews.author: Count Crisco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and put a big smile on my daughter's face. Win-win!
customer_reviews.author: B&N

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for about age 2 to 6 year olds
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my 21⁄2 hear old granddaughter. She loves it. She quickly picked up his to ride it. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: EJenira

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous quad!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2 year olds birthday. She absolutely loves it. It's easy for her to push the button to go and to control the steering.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous do not purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: The worst! Don't buy this. Doesn't work on grass, or any form of hill. Wheels always spin as they have no grip. Truly the worst product, so dissapointed and we bought two as we have Twins!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put assemble. For my 13 Mo. grand daughter. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

product_meta.title: Kid Trax Toddler Marvel & Disney Electric Quad and Motorcycle Ride On Toy, Kids 1.5-3 Years Old, 6 Volt Battery and Charger Included, Max Weight 45 lbs, Multiple Colors
product_meta.description: Your little girl will be a star riding on this Frozen quad with this easy to ride and operate 6 volt ride on. Kid Trax Power Trax rubber traction strip tires for sound traction and the easy push button drive system and 6 Volt charging system is a breeze to operate. Contoured pin cushion fashion seat, Max speed is 1.5 MPH.
feature_bullets: Easy push button drive system on handlebars
Kid Trax Power Trax Rubber Traction Strip Tires
Contoured seat for comfort and style, molded & textured foot steps
Front bumper doubles as a handle for easy carrying
6 volt battery and wall charger included

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
